Arabic keyboard is a smart and free keyboard designed for Arabs, making writing easy, fast and enjoyable.   Arabic font decorated Do you prefer your line to be distinguished from the others? We have many Arabic fonts to choose from   Convert from Franco to Arabic Can not write Arabic language or unusual writing? Do not worry about the Arabic keyboard Franco has the use of English characters to write Arabic quickly and accurately   Multiple and diverse backgrounds  Over 100 distinct Arabic backgrounds  Possibility to choose a background image   Many posters and animation  Hundreds of smileys and emoji  Posters and cartoons of Arab celebrities  Can design funny and emoji objects of your own   write speed TAMAM smart and modern keyboard makes writing easy while communicating with friends and family   Voice input Tired of writing?
